_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: polymath
author: khisabkurniawan@outlook.com
description: A rewrite of oraxen/polymath in typescript

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# NodeJS App Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

apt update
apt install -y git curl jq file unzip make gcc g++ python3 python3-dev python3-pip libtool

echo -e "updating npm and yarn. please wait..."
npm install npm@latest --location=global

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

# Clone the Polymath repository
git clone https://github.com/Arknesia/Polymath.git .

export HOME=/mnt/server

# Install dependencies using yarn
yarn install

# Build Polymath
yarn build

echo -e "Installation complete"
exit 0
